name: The Elementalist (itch) (kdokos)
description: The Elementalist is a 2D Vertically Scrolling Platform Game featuring Arcanox, a young magician who wishes to master the Elemental powers of the Earth, Water, Frost, Fire, Air and Darkness, by defeating the 6 Elemental Guardians that reside in their domains. There are 6 worlds in total, consisting of 3 levels plus a boss level each. Each world has its' own mechanics as they reflect upon Arcanox, and every boss or enemy has a specific attacking pattern, which the player must identify in order to complete the game.
